rotate_the_blade_twice.description: Rotate the blade twice to ensure it rotates freely.

clean_rotate_and_confirm_blade.description: Clean the blade, rotate it and confirm it rotates freely.

rotate_and_wipe_blade.description: Rotate the blade and then wipe it for maintenance.

check_rotation_of_blade.description: Rotation check of the blade to ensure smooth functioning.

clean_rotate_blade.description: Clean the blade and then rotate it for maintenance.

rotate_and_confirm_blade.description: Rotate the blade and confirm its functionality.

rotate_blade_again.description: Rotate the blade again to ensure it is working properly.

clean_rotate_and_press_blade.description: Clean the blade, rotate it, and then press it for full routine maintenance.

clean_and_press_blade.description: Clean the blade and then press it.

rotate_blade.description: Turn the blade by rolling it on the axis.

rotate_blade_twice.description: Rotate the blade twice to make sure it moves smoothly.

clean_and_rotate_blade_once.description: Clean the blade and then rotate it once.

rotate_clean_and_validate_blade.description: Rotate the blade, clean it and validate its functionality.

clean_and_press_knife_body_twice.description: Clean and press the knife body twice.

press_knife_body_and_clean_twice.description: Press the knife body and clean it twice.

pressure_check_and_clean.description: Press the knife body for pressure check and then clean.

clean_knife_body_twice.description: Twice cleaning of the knife body to ensure complete removal of dirt or debris.

validate_knife_body.description: Check the knife body for any damages or debris.

clean_and_validate_knife_body.description: Clean the knife body then validate it for functionality.

clean_and_press_knife_body_again.description: Clean the knife body again and then press it to ensure no dirt or debris is left.

press_and_clean_body.description: Press the knife body first and then clean it.

clean_and_press_knife_body.description: Clean the knife body and then press it.

clean_knife_body.description: Clean the knife body to remove any dirt or debris.

press_knife_body_twice.description: Press the knife body twice to ensure no damages.

clean_press_and_validate_knife_body.description: Clean the knife body, press it and validate it for any damages.

press_clean_and_validate_knife_body.description: Press the knife body, clean it and validate it.

knife_care_cycle.description: Full knife care cycle: clean the entire knife and its blade, rotate the blade, and press the body.

clean_rotate_press_and_double_check.description: Clean the knife and its blade, rotate the blade, press the body, and complete status twice for double-checking.

clean_and_double_press_knife.description: Clean the whole knife including its body and blade, press the knife twice.

double_rotate_press_and_clean_whole_knif.description: Rotate the blade twice, press the body and clean the whole knife.

bladecare_cycle.description: Clean the blade, rotate it and validate for a complete bladecare cycle.

bodycare_cycle.description: Clean the body, press and validate for a complete bodycare cycle.

fullcare_cycle.description: Complete maintenance cycle of the knife by cleaning the whole knife, validating, and checking rotation.

rotate_clean_and_press_whole_knife.description: Rotate the blade, then clean and press the whole knife for a complete maintenance cycle.

clean_and_rotate_whole_knife.description: Clean the whole knife, including body and blade, then rotate the blade for optimal performance.

complete_status.description: Mark the knife status as complete without performing any actions.

clean_and_press_whole_knife.description: Clean the whole knife, including blade and body, then press them.

press_and_clean_whole_knife.description: Press the whole knife, including blade and body, then clean them.

status_complete.description: Complete the status of the knife.

clean_whole_knife.description: Clean the whole knife, including blade and body, to remove dirt or debris.

rotate_and_clean_knife.description: Rotate the blade and clean the whole knife.

blade_check_cycle.description: Rotate the blade twice, clean it and validate for the complete blade check cycle.

body_check_cycle.description: Press the knife body twice, clean it and validate for the complete body check cycle.

full_check_cycle.description: Complete check cycle of the knife by rotating the blade twice, pressing the body twice, cleaning them and validating.

rotate_and_press_whole_knife_validate.description: Rotate the blade twice, press the body twice, clean the whole knife and validate.
